name: places/ChIJfX3gNLxYwokR6ZE2__J6kss
formattedAddress: 156a E 83rd St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 156a E 83rd St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
Where do I begin? Sometimes life can be so hard that it makes you lose faith in finding good people, and after my family and I lost everything in a flood last year we were left in limbo. We were blessed to meet Eli who showed us one of Harlington’s apartments in Queens, and we instantly fell in love with not only the place but with the feeling of already being “at home”
Ms. Eileen, Becca, and Jean, and all of the folks at Harlington have been some of the most responsive, helpful, kind and understanding people. If they would have me forever I’ll gladly stay! You seriously won’t find a better management company! TRUST ME! Oh and we have THE BEST SUPER! Always friendly, and always willing to help no matter what! It really doesn’t get any better than Harlington!

originalText.text: The process with my clients was very fast and easy. No issues on our part plus compared to the other units we saw this was definitely the better apartment and deal. The process for the lease and payment was all online making it easy on my clients who don’t live in NYC yet. Management was super responsive and helpful the whole time. Looking forward to bringing more clients!

originalText.text: My experience with Harrington Realty was a good one. I rented in Bayside, Queens for 2 years. My building was well maintained and any of my concerns were immediately addressed. When I decided to move, Eileen made the process very easy by communicating exactly what was expected of me and the apartment.

When I decided to move, Eileen made the process very easy by communicating exactly what was expected of me and the apartment.

originalText.text: I’ve been a resident of Harlington for a long. Danny is by far the most competent and knowledgeable super we’ve had at my building. He knows how to fix and install virtually anything, and if there’s a problem, he always responds promptly. He’s much appreciated and makes living in a NYC rental unit much easier.

He knows how to fix and install virtually anything, and if there’s a problem, he always responds promptly. He’s much appreciated and makes living in a NYC rental unit much easier.

originalText.text: I have been renting at a property of Harlington Realty for over 5 years and hope to stay for another couple of years because I simply love the area where I am and my apt is everything Ive needed these last 5 years.  Also the property management team are professional and very accommodating and always respond to my needs in a quick and helpful manner.  Special thanks to Eileen Toribio as she is simply amazing.
